tr_timeInServiceDesc: The time will be added to the ministry timer
tr_sharedMinistry: Shared in any form of ministry during this month
tr_addRecordDesc: You don’t have any daily service records yet. Add one here to fill out your monthly report.
tr_extraTimeDesc: Do you want to transfer this time over to the next month?
tr_applicationAPSDesc: Because of my love for Jehovah and my desire to help others to learn about him and his loving purposes, I would like to increase my share in the field service by enrolling as an auxiliary pioneer for the period indicated below:
tr_continuousAPS: I desire to serve continuously as an auxiliary pioneer until further notice.
tr_pioneerApplicationMoral: I am of good moral standing and habits. I have made plans that will enable me to meet the hour requirement. – See the <0>June 2013 Our Kingdom Ministry, p. 2</0>.
tr_noteAPSApplication: NOTE: If possible, please submit this application at least a week before you desire to begin your auxilary pioneer service. This application is not to be sent to the branch office but, rather, will be kept by the congregation for its files.
tr_attentionServiceCommittee:
Attention Congregation Service committee:

1. Is the applicant a good example in Christian living, being of good moral character?

2. Persons reproved or reinstated during the past year or those who still have restrictions on them do not qualify.

3. Have you consulted with the appropriate group overseer?
tr_approvingAPSApplication: To be approved by service committee members:
tr_moreInformationForAP: Interested in becoming a full-time pioneer? Apply at <0>hub.jw.org</0> or contact the elders in your congregation.
tr_hourGoalDesc: To serve continuously, the goal should be 30 hours. However, during specific months announced by your elders, you can also apply for 15 hours.
tr_applicationSubmittedDesc: Service committee of your congregation will review it and if it’s approved, you will get notified by them
tr_partnerNeededDesc: Other publishers will see this and be able to arrange with you
tr_havePartnerDesc: Select your partner from the list or enter their name
tr_addToCalendarDesc: Do you want to add this event to your personal calendar? You should have a calendar app installed on your device.
tr_deletePWLocationDesc: Deleting this location permanently removes all its data and arrangements. This action cannot be undone.
tr_cantDeductStudiesDesc: You can’t select fewer studies than you already have selected in the “Individual Bible studies” menu.
tr_noDailyRecordsDesc: У тебя еще нет ежедневных записей о служении. Добавь запись, чтобы включить её в свой ежемесячный отчет.
tr_reportPageInfo: On this page, you can view reports from publishers and add reports from those who do not use Organized. Select a publisher to start.
tr_alreadySubmittedWarning: This month’s report has already been submitted to the Branch Office. Only late reports can be added, unless you undo the submission.
tr_submitReportDesc: Submit the report for this month to your elders?
tr_noDailyRecordsMonthClosed: No daily service records for this month.
tr_undoSubmissionDesc: Are you sure to undo the submission of this report? Please note that this will also remove the report already sent to the secretary.
tr_undoSubmissionDone: Please make any necessary adjustments to this report and submit it again as soon as possible
tr_specialMonthsDesc: List of months where auxiliary pioneers can report 15 hours
tr_bibleStudiesNotice: Report one study per student each month
tr_hoursCreditPresetAddedInfo: The chosen credit hours preset will appear in the monthly report's comment field. Edit it there if needed.
tr_S10ReportNotGenerated: This year’s report hasn’t been generated yet. Generate it to see all the details and then submit.
tr_quickAssignAPDesc: This publisher is assigned as an auxiliary pioneer this month. You can change this on the publisher's enrollments window on the Persons page.
